meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of an epic.
meanings.sent1: The movie had an epiclike storyline with heroes and battles.
meanings.sent2: The book painted an epiclike picture of a grand adventure.
meanings.sent3: The children's play had an epiclike quest for a lost toy.
meanings.sent4: Her journey to success was an epiclike saga of determination.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured an epiclike scene of ancient warriors.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics of an epic.
meanings.sent1: The epiclike music filled the room with a sense of grandeur.
meanings.sent2: The epiclike poem celebrated the bravery of the warriors.
meanings.sent3: The cake was an epiclike creation with layers of deliciousness.
meanings.sent4: His speech had an epiclike impact on the audience.
meanings.sent5: The landscape had an epiclike beauty that took your breath away.

meanings.definition: In a manner similar to an epic.
meanings.sent1: The story was told epiclike, with great emphasis on the heroes.
meanings.sent2: She fought epiclike, never giving up despite the challenges.
meanings.sent3: The race was run epiclike, with each runner pushing their limits.
meanings.sent4: He tackled the project epiclike, with meticulous planning and execution.
meanings.sent5: The play was performed epiclike, captivating the audience with its grandeur.
